title: 06/25/21 DPS Hour 3
itunes:title: 06/25/21 DPS Hour 3
description:
Dan talks about what Scottie Pippen had to say about KD and Charles Barkley. Dan says that Scottie calling Phil Jackson racist should be the story and the press is not reporting it.
